flows.title: Quick Action: Discover a Career Path & Explore Programs
flows.description: A quick action taker wants to quickly understand a career role and see associated learning programs to assess immediate relevance for their skill development.
user_goals: View a relevant learning program for a selected career
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on the 'Careers' navigation link
Select any available career role from the listings on the career academy page
Click on any associated professional certificate or specialization link displayed on the career role page

flows.title: Detailed Researcher: Investigate Online Degree Programs
flows.description: A detailed researcher wants to explore the available online degree programs, understanding their structure, partners, and requirements before making a decision.
user_goals: Review details of a specific degree program or its hosting partner
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on the 'Online Degrees' navigation link
Select any available online degree program or a partner associated with degrees from the listings
Review the program's overview or its host institution's details

flows.title: Price/Feature Comparer: Evaluate Business Learning Solutions
flows.description: A user interested in 'price/feature comparison' (in a B2B context) is evaluating Coursera's offerings for organizations, looking for different solutions and features for business teams.
user_goals: Understand Coursera's enterprise offerings for organizations
Explore specific solutions and features designed for business teams
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on the 'For Businesses' navigation link
Navigate to any specific business solution page (e.g., 'Teams' or 'Enterprise' solutions link)
Review the features and benefits presented for the business solution

flows.title: Information Seeker: Research Partner Institutions and Offerings
flows.description: An information seeker wants to understand Coursera's network of partners to evaluate the credibility, range, and types of content providers.
user_goals: Discover Coursera's educational and industry partners
Explore the offerings or profile of a specific partner institution
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Navigate to an 'About' or 'Partners' section of the website
Select any available partner institution or organization from the list
Review the partner's dedicated page for information regarding their programs or profile

flows.title: Mobile User: Rapid Topic-Based Course Discovery
flows.description: A time-constrained mobile user wants to quickly find new or trending courses in a specific topic area without extensive browsing or filtering.
user_goals: Quickly find learning content on a specific, popular topic
Access the overview of a relevant course or program to assess interest
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on any prominent 'Explore' or 'Trending Topics' link (e.g., 'Generative AI', 'New on Coursera')
Select any listed course, specialization, or program from the topic page results
View the overview page of the selected learning item to learn more
